query.statement:
INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZPSTPM01 ( MANDT, PSPID, POSID, INPT, SEQNO , GUBUN, BIGO, CDATE, CNAME, CTIME )
VALUES ( #G_MANDT#, #PJT#, #PJT#||#HNO#, 'B', ( SELECT SAPHEE.FILLINZERO(INT(VALUE(MAX(SEQNO),'0'))+1,3) AS SEQNO FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTPM01 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PSPID = #PJT# AND POSID = #PJT#||#HNO# AND INPT = 'B' ), 'C' , 'Âø°øÀü½ÇÃø' , HEX(CURRENT DATE), #G_USER_ID#, HEX(CURRENT TIME) )
